thread.title: Fetty Wap Button app screams ‘Squaa’
thread.title_full: Fetty Wap Button app screams ‘Squaa’ - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Fetty Wap Button app screams ‘Squaa’
text:
In a nutshell : Press on-screen buttons to hear much-hyped rapper Fetty Wap recite memorable words from his summertime hit “Trap Queen.”
Cool factor : If you’re ever stuck trying to entertain a room full of Millennials, this might buy you a few minutes. A virtual sound board invites users to blast several of the one-eyed artist’s most famous lines — including “Ya Baby,” “Squaa,” “Glock” and “Ay” — through the speakers in their iOS device.
Note: The app is free, through it does come with ads that run across the top of the screen. It is seemingly available only in the Apple App Store.
— Sean Sposito, ssposito@sfchronicle.com
